short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Expands the context menu's 'search for' allowing search the selected text with different search engines..

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Expands the context menu's 'search for' allowing search the selected text with different search engines.
Search engines shown in the context menu are configured by 'popup' shown on the Google Chrome toolbar.
This extension use the language defined in Google Chrome to make search and translate the toolbar popup
 
Extension usage:
-> Select the text you want to search
-> Right click about it
-> Click on search engine you desired
 
You need at Least Google Chrome version 35.0.1916 for use this extension
